斗罗大陆2 - 绝世唐门
Soul Land II - The Unrivaled Tang Sect
Soul Land 2 - The Unrivaled Tang Sect

description.en:
A land without magic, dou-qi, martial arts, but with essence spirits instead. This is the continent 10,000 years after the formation of the Tang Sect. A new hero and his friend walk the land, a new "Seven Monsters of Shriek." Will they keep up the name of the Tang Sect? Or will it crumble due to a new essence system?  

---

**Notes:**
- This is Soul Land's sequel, but you don't have to read it before reading this. There might be spoilers though.
- Starting at chapter 181, the manhua format changes to long strip.

altTitles.pt-br: O Conto de Fadas de uma Madrasta

description.en:
They called her the Iron Widow. 

When her husband died, he left her to manage not only his vast holdings but also his four children. Young and inexperienced, Shuri nonetheless tried her best to raise them, despite their bitter attitude towards her. She is finally free to live her own life as her eldest son marries... only to find herself mysteriously reset to seven years ago — the night of her husband's funeral. 

Can Shuri find happiness with this second chance at a new destiny?
description.es:
La viuda de hierro, la viuda araña, la cazadora de hombres, la bruja del Castillo Neuschwanstein, la vergüenza de las damas de la nobleza… Estos eran los términos usados para describir a la Marquesa Shuli von Neuschwanstein. A pesar de recibir tan duras críticas de todos, ella persistió en criar a sus 'hijos', dejados a su cargo por su difunto esposo. En el día de la boda de su hijo mayor, en la que él tomó posesión del título familiar de Marqués, ella sintió que por fin había atado todos esos cabos sueltos y que por fin podría vivir su vida pacíficamente. Sin embargo, se equivocó de sobremanera, pues se halla víctima de un accidente mortal en el momento de su partida de dicha boda. Al abrir sus ojos, se halla despertando el día mismo del funeral de su esposo, siete años atrás.

'Me rehuso a sufrir más. ¡No viviré como viví en el pasado por segunda vez!'

---

description.fr:
Belle-mère à la rescousse! Mariée à l'âge de quatorze ans à un vieux noble rapidement décédé, elle se retrouve à devoir s'occuper de ses quatre beaux-enfants à peine plus jeunes qu'elle. Des années plus tard, ces derniers la détestent à cause des choix qu'elle a dû faire pour les protéger... Soudain, une seconde chance s’offre à elle! Saura-t-elle ne pas répéter les mêmes erreurs?

Shuri baru berusia 16 tahun saat ditinggal mati Yohanes Neuwanstein, suaminya. Tidak hanya harta berlimpah, mendiang suaminya juga meninggalkan empat anak tiri, Jeremy, Elias, serta si kembar Rachel dan Leon, yang lebih cocok jadi adik Shuri!

description.ja:
『神様、こんなの…あんまりです…!』

田舎の無名家門に生まれたシュリーは、貧しい家族の企みでノイヴァンシュタイン侯爵の元へ嫁がされる。
でも、侯爵が亡くなって…いきなり4人の子どもの継母に――!?
『鉄血の未亡人』と非難されながらも必死に当主としての役目を果たしついに迎えた長男・ジェレミーの結婚式の日――。
継母としての務めを終え、新たな人生を始めようと馬車に乗ったはずなのに…7年前の侯爵の葬儀の日に逆戻り!!
周囲に敵ばかりだったシュリーの2度目の継母ライフはいかに……?

description.ko:
철혈의 미망인, 거미 과부, 남자 사냥꾼,
노이반슈타인 성의 마녀, 귀부인들의 수치…….

모두 슈리 폰 노이반슈타인 후작 부인을 가리키는 말이다.
세상에 욕 먹어 가며 동생뻘인 피 한 방울 섞이지 않은 자식들을 키워냈다.

그리고 마침내 첫째 제레미의 결혼식 날,
모든 고생과 노력이 결실을 맺는 날이라 생각했다.
그러나 그것은 그녀의 엄청난 착각이었다.

결혼식에 오지 말라는 통보를 듣고
성을 떠나던 중, 사고에 휘말려 목숨을 잃게 된 것이다.

그런데 눈을 떠보니, 칠 년 전 죽은 남편의 장례식 날로 돌아왔다.

더 이상 개고생은 사양이다.
두 번 다시 예전처럼 살지 않으리라!

---

铁血遗孀,蜘蛛寡妇,诺斯坦城的魔女,贵妇们的耻辱。这些都是暗指施里诺斯坦侯爵夫人。 她一边挨骂,一边培养着没有一滴血缘关系的弟弟辈子女。在长子的婚礼那天，她卷入事故而失去了生命。 再睁开眼,时间又回到七年丈夫的葬礼那天，这次，她不会再像从前那样生活了！

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian

Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

title.en: Henjo ~Hen na Joshi Kousei Amaguri Senko~

altTitles.ja: 変女～変な女子高生 甘栗千子～

altTitles.en: Henjo: The Strange Female High-Schooler Amaguri Senko

description.en: Amaguri Senko is a high school girl with a cool personality (as in kuudere) and a big pervert. She openly reads porn, masturbates and isn't perturbed in the slightest at the sight of penises and such. The story centers around Senko's daily life with two male handymen working for her father's company  which she also helps out with, Takamura Ryou and Sugita Kouhei. Takamura ends up being constantly sexually harassed by Senko, partially due to his phimosis dick that caught her interest,  but little did he know, she wasn't joking when she bluntly said "I like you"…
description.fr: Amaguri Senko est une lycéenne kuudere, mais surtout une gigantesque perverse. Elle lit ouvertement du porno, se masturbe et la vue d'un pénis ne l'affecte pas le moins du monde. Voici l'histoire de sa vie quotidienne en compagnie de deux hommes-à-tout-faire employés de la société de son père : Sugita Kouhei et Takamura Ryou. Ce dernier se retrouve constamment harcelé sexuellement par Senko, mais il est bien loin de se douter qu'elle ne plaisantait pas le jour où elle lui a dit qu'elle l'aimait…
description.ja: 就職難のこの時代、フツーの男子・高村の就職先は今どき珍しい住み込みスタイルの「便利屋 甘栗」！そこの娘の千子ちゃんは女子高生でカワイイんだけど、少し?変な?女子高生だった！突如、始まった彼女との同居生活は事件の連続!?
description.pt-br: Amaguri Senko é uma estudante do ensino médio com uma personalidade legal (como em kuudere) e uma grande pervertida. Ela lê pornografia abertamente, se masturba e não se incomoda nem um pouco ao ver pênis e coisas assim. A história gira em torno da vida diária de Senko com dois trabalhadores manuais que trabalham para a empresa de seu pai, na qual ela também ajuda, Takamura Ryou e Sugita Kouhei. Takamura acaba sendo constantemente assediado sexualmente por Senko, em parte devido ao seu pênis com fimose que despertou seu interesse, mas ele mal sabia que ela não estava brincando quando disse sem rodeios "Eu gosto de você"...

description.en: Due to the school bully's threat to get him game items, Ha Do-wan, the unlucky game shuttle, died after playing games all night long for a week. The moment he died, he got respawned to the classroom one week before he died... Everything is the same as that day. The only thing that has changed is the floating in front of him! What? Use the skills of the games I've played so far to beat the bully?!?!
description.fr: À cause de la menace des harceleurs de son école qui l'obligent à gagner des objets dans un jeu, Ha Do-Wan, le malheureux joueur à tout faire, est mort après avoir joué sans arrêt pendant une semaine. Au moment où il est mort, il s'est fait réincarner dans sa salle de classe une semaine avant sa mort... Tout est comme ce jour-là. La seule chose qui a changé est cette fenêtre volante devant lui ! Quoi ? Utiliser les skills que j'ai utilisé dans tous les jeux auxquels j'ai pu jouer jusqu'ici pour battre les harceleurs ?!?!
description.ru: После угроз и запугиваний школьного хулигана, который требовал добыть предметы, Ха До Ван всю неделю проводит ночи напролет за играми, умирает и перерождается в школьном кабинете за неделю до этого... Все было точно таким же, как в тот день. Изменилось только одно - это "Оповещение о квесте", которое всплыло перед глазами! Что? От меня требуется победить этого хулигана, используя все мои игровые навыки?
description.pt-br: Após ser forçado pelo valentão da escola a dropar um item lendário, Ha Dowan, o escravo gamer, morre depois de passar a sete dias seguidos jogando. No momento de sua morte, ele renasce na sala de aula, uma semana antes do dia em que morreu. Tudo está exatamente igual àquele dia. A única coisa diferente é que a <notificação de missão> está flutuando na frente dele! “O quê? tenho que usar as habilidades de todos os jogos que joguei até hoje pra descer o cacete nesse desgraçado?!”

altTitles.ja: 阿部くんに狙われてます

description.en: Akari couldn't think less of her school's karate champ, Abe-kun, despite him being the national champion. He's giant, uncouth, and couldn't be more different than her sweet angel and childhood friend, Takuto. But when Abe-kun injures his arm protecting her, she takes it upon herself to get him healed—after all, the school's pride is at stake—but finds the tables suddenly turned when he confesses to her! Now she's the goal he's aiming for, and she'll soon find out how driven a national champion can be!
With no savings, average qualifications, and a bank balance consistently below 10,000 won, can the Backbone Breaker Gye Baeksun really escape unemployment?

"Without victory, survival is impossible."

In pursuit of becoming the supreme being among all living creatures, the mad martial artist, Ma Jinwol, once turned the martial world into a sea of blood. However, after a climactic battle with the Five Masters of the World, he was sealed away. Millennia have passed… and now, he awakens, not on Earth, but on an alien planet. 

Here, at the GSP, a universal combat tournament is held once every 100 years, and he prepares to face the strongest warriors once more.
description.ko:
"승리하지 못하면 살아남을 수 없다."

모든 생물의 정점에 오르고자 과거 무림을 피바다로 만들었던 광마 ‘마진월’. 그러나 천하오절과의 싸움 끝에 광마는 봉인된다. 수천년이 시간이 흘러... 그가 눈을 뜬 곳은 지구가 아닌 외계 행성. 

이곳, 100년에 한 번 전우주 격투 토너먼트가 열리는 GSP에서다시 한번 강자들과의 싸움이 시작되려 한다.

description.en:
Park Hyung-Seok is an unattractive loner who wakes up in a different body. Now tall, handsome, and cooler than ever in his new form, Hyung-Seok aims to achieve everything he couldn't before.

How far will he go to keep his body... and his secrets?
description.pt: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?

altTitles.ja: 悪党たちに育てられてます！

altTitles.pt-br: Eu estou sendo criada por vilões

description.en:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
description.tr: Gayrimeşru bir çocuk olduğumu sanıyordum… ama tamamen yabancı olduğum ortaya çıktı?! Yan karakter olarak beden değiştirdikten bir yıl sonra kovulmanın eşiğinde olduğumu öğrendim. Evden tek başıma çıkmayı tercih ederim dedim. “Aslında bu çocuk benim kızım. Değil mi kızım?” Psikopat dükün dikkatini mi çektim ? "Biriyle oynadıktan sonra verdiği paranın bir ada almaya yettiğini duydum?" Onunla kızı olarak iyi anlaştım çünkü daha sonra servetini ele geçirebileceğimi düşündüm ve birkaç ay sonra onun evinden kalın bir banka hesabıyla ayrılmayı planladım. "Sana gitmeni söyleyene kadar yanımda kal." Ancak beni oyuncak gibi gören babam beni aramaya geldi ve beni tuttu. *** Babamın iknasıyla eve döndükten sonra aileler ve babam beni evlat edinmek için mücadele etti. Amcalarım ve teyzelerim beni korumak için toplandılar ve geleceğin psikopatları bana karşı garip saplantılar beslemeye başladılar. "Doğum günün kutlu olsun Ayrin. Bugün itibariyle başkan sensin.” Üstelik Dük'ün konumu benim doğum günü hediyemdi. Her şey beklediğim gibi gidiyor. [Hey, daha ne kadar uyuyacaksın? Büyükanne sana tutucunu çıkarmanı söyledi!] [Cha Miso, öleceksin!] Bu ses nedir? Böyle iyi olacak mıyım?
description.pt-br: Negligenciada por sua família, Cha Miso sonha em viver em seu romance favorito como a amada personagem principal. Então, um dia, ela acorda dentro do romance, mas como Eiryn Etam, uma personagem secundária oprimida que será expulsa de sua casa! Para evitar mais negligência, ela planeja ir embora antes que isso aconteça. Mas quando Erno Etam, o herdeiro maluco da Casa Etam, afirma que Eiryn é sua filha, seus planos são frustrados e Eiryn se vê no meio de um conflito entre a Casa Etam e um elenco de vilões.

description.en:
'Sejong's secret weapon, Shadow Unit informer.'
Gwiyoung, called the Ghost's Shadow, has been wandering around the battlefield since childhood.
Vowing to get revenge, he decided to become a member of the nation's best special forces as an informer.

title.en: I Was Immediately Mistaken for a Monster Genius Actor

altTitles.pt-br: Eu fui confundido como um ator gênio monstro

description.en:
One day, Kang Woo-jin suddenly gains the ability to enter a subspace when he reads a script or scenario, and to become the character himself through the subspace. 

And then, at an audition location where he followed his friend, he happened to show the acting he experienced through the subspace…?
description.ko:
평범한 소시민 강우진에게 어느 날 갑자기대본이나 시나리오를 보면 아공간에 들어갈 수 있고,아공간을 통해 배역 자체가 될 수 있는 능력이 생긴다.

그리고 친구를 따라간 오디션 장소에서우연히 아공간을 통해 경험한 연기를 보여주게 되었는데…?

altTitles.ja: パラレルパラダイス

altTitles.vi: Thiên đường song song tại dị giới

description.en: One day at school, Youta sees someone strange entering his school. Out of nowhere this being appears next to him and makes him fall from the 3rd floor. He lands in a strange world, where beings like dragons exist! Youta meets a young paladin, and discovers that he is the only man inhabiting that planet, and that its inhabitants are extremely 'weak' to his presence. Could this be paradise?
description.ja: 異世界に迷い込んだ男子高生・太多陽太は、森の中で美少女騎士・ルーミと出会う。そこは少女だけが存在する世界。神の化身からルーミとの交尾を命じられる陽太。触れられただけで極限まで発情したルーミは‥‥!?
description.es-la: “Por favor, apareate conmigo”. En un mundo extraño, Youta Tada es atacado por una hermosa chica caballero en celo. Solamente monstruos temidos y chicas hermosas viven en este mundo.¡El único hombre es Youta Tada! ¿¡Es esto el cielo o el infierno para Youta!?
description.pt-br: Em um dia na escola Youta vê alguém estranho entrando na escola, do nada este ser aparece ao seu lado e o joga do 3º andar! Porém ele vai parar em um mundo estranho, onde seres parecidos com dragões existem! Youta conhece uma jovem paladina, e descobre que é o único homem habitando aquele planeta, e que suas habitantes são extremamente ‘fracas’ a sua presença… seria este o paraíso?!

description.en: Wang Dokpil, the boss of Jeolhwa, the largest organization in Chungcheong, and his son, Wang Dam. After his father’s death, Wang Dam has a different dream than inheriting his father’s organization and decides to head to Seoul on a whim. But life isn’t that simple, as he envisioned his uncle, who was a member of the organization, proposes a condition that if Wang Dam becomes No. 1 in his new school, he’ll receive a settlement allowance. However, Wang Dam’s new school, notoriously known as Ppak High, is infamous for school violence. Can Wang Dam become No. 1 in Ppak High School, the one full of the nation’s worst troublemakers?

The number one school in the country, Kangsan High School, Goo Se Ra, has a crush on Lee Seo Jun, who comes to Kangsan High School for teaching. She experiences all sorts of hardships with problem students. In order to protect her crush, Goo Se Ra decides to turn the worst problem school into a model school.

altTitles.es-la: La vida del regresor después del retiro

description.en:
After the first Gate opened in 2018, Lim Dae-In survived for 20 years on Earth while being connected to other dimensions. 

The day after his long-awaited retirement celebration, he regresses by 20 years, back to when he had nothing…

“The complex of the boy, Choi Si-woo, is being overweight. Choi Si-woo runs and runs around his house until past midnight, and he encounters an old man on a walking trail. In the blink of an eye, the old man covers Choi Si-woo with the straw backpack he is carrying. Where Choi Si-woo had stumbled upon was an enormously wide ruined traditional Korean house (hanok).

At the edge of the spacious courtyard, surrounding him on the courtyard, there were numerous black shadows standing. To the bewildered Choi Si-woo, the old man speaks. Once every 666 years, a ceremony is held to select the king of Yokai and each Yokai in this world possesses one entry ticket for it. And Choi Si-woo is, in fact, a hybrid of a human and a goblin, inheriting the blood of an extinct goblin. Among the goblin folk, only Choi Si-woo possesses the entry ticket. As the sole survivor inheriting the blood of a goblin, the adventure of the half-monster boy, Choi Si-woo, begins.”

Planets dying, gods falling. “Anomalies” and “Calamities” invade the human world. As a dark age descends, Shen Ye finds himself flung into this strange new reality. To his surprise, his power is to summon a door – a door leading to countless worlds, offering him a chance to adventure and train across the multiverse! Beyond the door, he encounters a mysterious skeleton with an unknown past…
description.zh: 星球死亡，众神陨落。“异常”与“灾祸”入侵人类世界。黑暗时代来临之际，沈夜穿越到这个异世界，惊奇得发现，自己的异能是召唤出一扇门，这扇门通往诸天万界，可以去不同世界冒险历练！他在门的另一边，结识了一具身份来历成迷的骷髅……
description.pt-br: Planetas morrendo, deuses caindo. “Anomalias” e “Calamidades” invadem o mundo humano. À medida que a era das trevas se aproxima, Shen Ye se vê lançado nesta estranha nova realidade. Para sua surpresa, seu poder é invocar uma porta – uma porta que leva a incontáveis ​​mundos, oferecendo-lhe a chance de se aventurar e treinar através do multiverso! Além da porta, ele encontra um esqueleto misterioso com um passado desconhecido...

altTitles.ja: サーシャちゃんとクラスメイトオタクくん
Саша и ее одноклассник Отаку

altTitles.es-la: La chica de secundaria Sasha-chan y su compañero de clases Otaku-kun

altTitles.vi: Bé sơ trung Sasha và thằng bạn Otaku cùng lớp

description.en:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me “Master”!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/57098)
description.fr:
Fujiwara est un mangaka amateur, il dessine des mangas érotiques alors qu’il n’est que collégien. Tandis qu'il lisait un porno à l'école, une jolie fille nommée Sasha qui s’avère être très intéressée par ces choses, et lui adresse la parole, elle se met même à l’appeler "Maître" !? 

  C’est l'histoire d'une belle et joyeuse fille qui se porte volontaire pour être mon disciple dans la perversion.
description.ja: 僕は未来の大漫画家にして現えっちな同人誌アシの中学生。学校で同人誌を読んでいたら、えっち方面に興味津々の美少女、サーシャさんから「ししょー」と呼ばれ‥‥!?
description.es-la: Sin importarle el qué dirán y sin temor a caer en lo más bajo de la escala social dentro de la escuela, Otaku-kun no oculta su gran afición por los mangas para adultos, cosa que le hace ganarse el rechazo de su salón apenas en el primer día de clases; sin embargo, Sasha, lejos de sentir aberración por su afición, muestra un interés peculiar, iniciando así una relación... ¡¿mentor-alumna?!

title.en: Evolution Begins With a Big Tree

altTitles.zh-ro: Cóng Dà Shù Kāishǐ De Jìnhuà

altTitles.ja: 進化する者たち

altTitles.vi: Chuyển Sinh Thành Liễu Đột Biến

altTitles.ru: Моё перерождение в древо: Начало эволюции

description.en:
Reborn as a willow tree!? Resurrection of spiritual energy, rise of all things. The reborn willow has also embarked on the path of evolution. It can evolve infinitely, is it “divine power” or “curse”?

Official Translations:
[Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/146958)
description.ru:
После смерти Юй Цзыюй перерождается и становится… Ивой! 
И неизвестно, сумеет ли он приспособиться к такой знакомой, но в то же время чуждой окружающей среде – ведь так совпало, что его перерождение случилось как раз во время Великой эпохи возрождения духовной энергии. 
Возрождение духовной энергии знаменует возвышение всех существ… 
Рев хищных зверей стал способен сотрясти горы и взволновать реки, а существа с могущественной силой наводнили этот мир в таком количестве, что он вот-вот лопнет по швам. 
Но, несмотря на все это, во время подобной эпохи выросла величественная ива, способная безгранично развиваться и эволюционировать. 
Плоды, что растут на ней, способны даровать другим необычайные способности, а духовная энергия, которую она распространяет, укрепляет силы зверей, что обитают на ее территории. 
… 
Одни величают ее мировым древом – Иггдрасилем, день за днем восславляя его существование! 
Другие – «великим божественным древом», подпирающим небосвод! 
Разумеется, большинство просто зовут его «священным древом», или «проклятым деревом», или же «дьявольским деревом»… Да и еще много как. 
И все же, при любом его упоминании в голосе каждого ясно слышится благоговейный трепет.
description.zh: 黑鸟社新作，重生成为一株柳树！？灵气复苏，万物崛起。重生的柳树也走上了进化之路。能够无限进化的它，是“神力”还是“诅咒”？

title.en: Last Boss Shoujo Akari - Watashi Yori Tsuyoi Yatsu ni Ai ni Gendai ni Iku

altTitles.en: Akari the Final Boss Girl ~I'm Going to the Modern Age to Find Someone Stronger Than Me~

altTitles.ja: ラスボス少女アカリ
ラスボス少女アカリ～ワタシより強いやつに会いに現代に行く～

altTitles.en: The Servant Is the Demon King?!

altTitles.vi: Đại Quản Gia Là Ma Hoàng

description.en:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
description.vi: Ma Hoàng Trác Nhất Phàm vì nhặt được một truyền thừa của Thượng Cổ Ma Đế, mà dẫn đến họa sát thân. Sau khi được trọng sinh vào một cơ thể khác, cũng bởi vì tâm ma của chủ nhân cơ thể cũ, mà không còn cách nào khác, phải làm quản gia cho một gia tộc nhỏ bé. Cùng xem một đại ma hoàng đầy thủ đoạn tàn độc, sẽ làm thế nào để khiến cho một gia tộc nhỏ bé trở mình thành một gia tộc đứng trên tất cả.
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um imperador mágico e o homem mais forte vivo, ele é traido pelo seu subordinado e é morto, após isso ele reencarna em um menino sem cultivo e começa a trilhar seu caminho para a vingança.

title.en: The Strange Adventure of a Broke Mercenary

altTitles.ja: 食い詰め傭兵の幻想奇譚
Fantasie Geshichte von soldner in groBer Armut

altTitles.en: The Strange Fantasy Story Of A Broke Mercenary

altTitles.th: เรื่องราวการผจญภัยสุดประหลาดของนายทหารถังแตก

altTitles.de: Fantasie Geschichte eines Söldners in Armut

description.en:
After the soldiers’ mercenary group where he used to work had been utterly destroyed, Loren, who survived the disaster, decided to walk the adventurer’s path as a way to make a living. However, for Loren who had no acquaintances and empty pockets, receiving a single quest seemed like a faraway aim. So, as he was contemplating about what he should do next, another adventurer called out to him.
___
**Character Designer:** [peroshi](https://mangadex.org/author/18c02af4-21c4-4b2a-a75a-6f0c5ee3d172/peroshi)

altTitles.ja: 人生リセット

altTitles.vi: Đô Thị Chi Nghịch Thiên Tiên Tôn

description.en: The Taoist god-killer brings the nine-day stone to life in the city, He can refine the alchemy, refine the tools, and understand the methods of battle, and sees how Lin Fan hangs all evil in the city, stepping to the top, overlooking the living beings step by step.
description.vi: Thần quân mang theo cửu thiên thần thạch, trùng sinh tại đô thị, biết luyện đan, có thể luyện khí, hiểu trận pháp, hãy nhìn lâm phàm tại đô thị làm như thế nào trừng trị kẻ ác, từng bước một phi thăng, quan sát chúng sinh.

description.en:
"It may be hazy blue, but that's alright"

Taking place a year after the epilogue of Seasons of Blossom, this story focuses on the new opening of “Cafe Blossom and NEMONE Atelier” as well as Bomi’s new classmate “Pureum” as they explore a new found youth. 

Campus romance, after school romance, office romance, it has it all.  

The heartwarming series is back with another youthful story!
description.fr:
« Ça peut être d'un bleu brumeux, mais c'est pas grave. »

Se déroulant un an après l'épilogue de "Seasons of Blossom", cette histoire se concentre sur la nouvelle ouverture du « Café Blossom and NEMONE Atelier », ainsi que sur la nouvelle camarade de classe de Bomi, « Pureum », alors qu'ils explorent une nouvelle jeunesse. Romance sur le campus, amours après l'école, romance au bureau, il y a de tout. La série réconfortante revient avec une nouvelle histoire pleine de jeunesse !

description.en: A sweet and happy two year marriage felt like a dream. One day, her husband disappeared without a trace. Han Seoryeong, an ordinary housewife and blind woman, desperately searches for him... “You’ll never find him.” Her husband turned out to be the best secret agent with many faces. “Our marriage was everything to me, but it was just ‘work’ to him?” In the midst of her world crumbling, Seoryeong mistakenly unleashes the madness she had been suppressing.…
description.fr:
Deux années de mariage aussi douces qu’un rêve.
Mais un jour, son mari disparaît sans laisser de trace.

Han Seoryeong, femme au foyer ordinaire et non-voyante, part à sa recherche,
mais la vérité qu’elle découvre dépasse l’imaginable.

Son mari était un agent secret aux cent visages,
et tout ce qu’elle croyait vrai n’était qu’une façade pour son “travail”.

Dévastée par le désespoir, Seoryeong laisse exploser la folie qu’elle avait refoulée.
Si elle ne peut pas le traquer, elle choisira de devenir sa proie !

description.en: “As a birthday present, i'll give you my boyfriend.” Me Ahyeon and the top actress Seong Si-eun, seem like the closest and best friends in the whole world. While Si-Eun is a bright and famous star, Ahyeon is known as “the girl you can ask any favor". At Ahyeon's birthday party, Si-eun announces that she's bringing her boyfriend. And then, Ahyeon realizes that she was talking about Nam Terry, a guy who has always hated her... Can they share a boyfriend while preserving their friendship? No matter what you do, he says that “I'll never be able to like you.”

altTitles.en: I Thought It's a Common Isekai Story
I Thought It Was a Common Possession

altTitles.fr: Not So Bad to Be Bad!

description.en: I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?
description.ko:
그럼 그렇지, 내 팔자에 무슨 주인공이야.

남편 손에 죽을 팔자의 악녀였지만, 난 이 클리셰를 안다!​
억울하게 죽은 대가로는 꽤 괜찮다고 생각했다.
원작의 흐름에서 벗어나지 못한다는 걸 깨닫기 전까지는.
결국 원작대로 죽을 거라면, 초미남 남편에게 뽀뽀라도 해보자!

title.en: Becoming a God, Starting as water monkey

description.en: The protagonist, Liang, transmigrates to a world called the Great Wilderness. He was In a desperate situation, he accidentally awakens a system called the “Ze Bloodline System,” and everything changes from that moment! By infusing himself with the bloodlines of ancient divine beasts, the protagonist is able to gain immense power while gradually refining his own godly talents. Come! Fuse with the Ze Spirit bloodline!!! System: “Awakened bloodline—Water Monkey.” Protagonist: “???”

title.en: Yuri no Hajimari wa Dorei Kara

altTitles.ja: 百合のはじまりは奴隷から

description.en:
Chiyoko Hanamura, a self-proclaimed *gyaru* who failed her high school debut, was skipping class as usual on the rooftop when her junior, Sakine, approached her. It seemed like Sakine had a favor to ask, as she handed Chiyoko a love letter.

"Could you turn down this confession for me?" she asked. However, the sender was unknown.

For the sake of her adorable junior, and to maintain her *gyaru* dignity, Chiyoko resolved to take on the task and went to refuse the confession...

title.en: I Can't Get Enough of You

altTitles.en: I Can’t Wait To Eat You

description.en: Outstanding talent. A look that won't be overlooked no matter where you are. A prosperous family. I lived by walking only on well-paved paths. Everything was so perfect to the point that it was boring. Then one day when I turned 30... Taejun Kim impulsively deviates from the path. To meet ‘Han So-eun’, the daughter of the driver who took his parents’ lives. 'With what kind of face did you come to this company?' The shameless face was disgusting. So he decided to stick around and torment her. Like a person who is impatient because he can't eat... “I think the director likes..."
description.fr:
Des capacités exceptionnelles. Une belle apparence qui ne passera pas inaperçue. Une famille aisée. Une vie sur un chemin bien tracé. Tout était ennuyeux et parfait. Jusqu'au jour où, à trente ans, Kim Tae-joon quitte impulsivement la route.
Rencontrer Han So-eun, la fille du chauffeur qui a coûté la vie à ses parents.
« Comment diable êtes-vous entré dans cette entreprise en tant qu'étranger ?
J'étais dégoûté par son impudeur, alors j'ai décidé de la garder et de la tourmenter. Comme quelqu'un qui n'en a jamais assez de toi....
"Je pense que j'aime le réalisateur."
Oh non.

description.en:
"How about a kiss for a wish?"
Seo Do-ya, a demon, had a strange dream one day and on the same day he met Sowon, a new student at school.
Why does my body react even if I just glance slightly at Sowon!?
Meanwhile, Sowon attended the new student's welcome party and met the popular actor Woo-Jae Hyeong.
Between Woo-Jae Hyeong and Seo Do-ya,who will Sowon choose?
A thrilling, dizzying, complicated and messy campus love life begins.

title.en: A Good-Natured Craftsman Leisurely Travels Through Another World

altTitles.ja-ro: Ohitoyoshi Shokunin no Burari Isekai Tabi

altTitles.ja: お人好し職人のぶらり異世界旅

description.en: Ryoichi Ishikawa, a young man who lost his father, who was his only relative, also decided to close the electrical shop that he and his father had been working on. From a strange matter, I choose to transfer to another world by my own will. It was supposed to be the second life of a leisurely trip, but I can not leave a person in need. We solve many worries by making full use of the cheat skills given by God and the skills of a craftsmen. Sometime around, friends with one or two habits gathered…! ?The journey of a good-natured craftsman in another world begins here!
description.ja:
唯一の肉親だった父を亡くし、父と二人で切り盛りしていた電気工事店も閉店する事になってしまった青年、石川良一。
ひょんな事から、自らの意思で異世界転移する事を選択する。
ぶらり旅する第二の人生……のはずだったが、困っている人は放っておけない。
神様から授かった数々のチートスキルと、職人としての技術を駆使してお悩み解決。
いつしか周りには一癖も二癖もある仲間たちが集まってきて…！？
お人好しな職人のドタバタ異世界旅、ここに開幕！

altTitles.en: Grandpa Samurai and Granddaughter of the Supreme

description.en: Just when Liu Jinshan thought he could die without regrets, his family was annihilated! As a result, he became determined to live just so that he could see his only surviving granddaughter, Liu Seol, reach adulthood. As he struggled to raise her and train her with his aging body, Liu Seol, who was born with the talent of a supreme martial artist, grew up much faster than he thought she would. "Don't worry, Grandpa, I'll protect you from now on!"

altTitles.ja: 無限レベルアップin武林

description.en:
Killed on the battlefield without glory to his name, Yuseong Dan receives an opportunity to grow stronger with a strange quest and level system. But each quest he’s forced to fight only seems to be getting harder and harder. Can he level up enough to avoid the same miserable ending and become the powerful hero he wishes to be?

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.ja:
ここは努力したぶん強くなれる世界

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.ko:
재능도 없고 출신도 비천했던 하급무사 단유성, 전쟁터에서 죽다.
하지만 저승인 줄 알고 눈을 떴더니, 어린 시절의 과거로 돌아와 있지 않은가?
이상한 숫자와 문자가 눈 앞에 보이고, 그 지시를 따르면 노력한 만큼 보상을 받기까지 한다.
노력한 만큼의 보상을 받는 세상. 무한레벨업 in 무림에 오신것을 환영합니다.

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.ru:
Тан Ю Сон, младший воин, не имевший таланта, с низким уровнем подготовки, погиб на поле боя.

Но когда он открыл глаза, он был сильно удивлён! Он вернулся в свое прошлое, когда ещё был ребёнком! Теперь он может изменить будущее!

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.pt-br: Morto no campo de batalha sem glória para seu nome, Yuseong Dan recebe a oportunidade de ficar mais forte com uma estranha missão e sistema de níveis. Mas cada missão que ele é forçado a lutar parece estar ficando cada vez mais difícil. Ele pode subir de nível o suficiente para evitar o mesmo final miserável e se tornar o herói poderoso que deseja ser?

altTitles.th: ยอดนักสืบจิ๋ว โคนัน

altTitles.ja: 名探偵コナン

description.en: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.

altTitles.ja: シュタインズ・ゲート・ゼロ

description.en: A manga adaptation of the Steins;Gate 0 Visual Novel.

altTitles.ja: ねずみの初恋

description.en:
Nezumi is a girl who was raised as a hitman by the yakuza and grew up not knowing human love. An ordinary young man, Ao, knows nothing. They fall in love and start to live together, but the evil hand is close at hand... This is a story of first love, so cruel and so sad.

Read the prequel oneshot featuring Messiah-chan's backstory [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).
description.fr: Nezumi est une fille qui a été élevée comme tueuse à gages par les yakuzas et qui a grandi sans connaître l'amour humain. Un jeune homme ordinaire, Ao, n'en sait rien. Ils tombent amoureux et commencent à vivre ensemble, mais la main du mal est proche.... C'est l'histoire d'un premier amour, si cruel et si triste.
description.ja: ヤクザに殺し屋として育てられ、人の愛を知らずに育った少女、ねずみ。何も知らない普通の青年、碧(あお)。二人は恋に落ち、共に暮らし始めるが、魔の手はすぐそこまで迫っていた‥‥。
description.pt-br:
Nezumi, uma garota criada como uma assassina pela yakuza, cresceu sem conhecer o amor humano. Ao, um jovem comum, não sabe nada sobre o passado sombrio dela. Mesmo assim, eles se apaixonam e começam a viver juntos, mas o perigo está à espreita... Esta é uma história de um primeiro amor, tão cruel e triste.

Leia o oneshot prequel, que conta a história de origem da Messiah-chan, [aqui](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).

description.en: The protagonist Yuan Zhenji crossed into the parallel world of Jiang Shi, and found that this world was full of various horrors and that ordinary humans were as fragile as paper before them. He used a book called the "Urban Legend Records" to create urban legends that affect reality, punish criminals, house horrors, absorb their abilities, and "use magic to defeat magic," becoming a watchdog who fights against horrors. With his allies, he'll counter the impending horror that seeks to extinguish the world.
description.vi:
Sau khi xuyên không tới đất nước Nhật Bản trong thế giới song song, Kanbaru Shinji có được một quyển sổ ghi chép tên là Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị Thực Lục.
Mọi truyền thuyết đô thị cậu ghi vào đó đều có thể trở thành sự thật.
Mà Nhật Bản ở thế giới này còn thiếu khuyết rất nhiều truyền thuyết đô thị từng xuất hiện trong kiếp trước như là Hanako nhà vệ sinh, Thiếu Nữ Đến Từ Địa Ngục, Quý bà Hachishaku, Cuộc gọi của Mary, Con Mắt Trong Khe Hở...
Kanbaru Shinji: “Để ta khiến cho Nhật Bản này quần ma loạn vũ đi!”
Tóm tắt theo tiểu thuyết gốc, bản manhua đã chỉnh sửa rất nhiều từ tên nhân vật cho đến bối cảnh, vui lòng theo dõi truyện để biết thêm chi tiết.

description.en:
Humanity lost the war. Businessmen who sold out their fellow compatriots, hunters who turned to the monsters, stepping on countless human corpses, all in order to earn profit. The otherworldly monsters that entered our world seized it bit by bit like a raging fire. That was until Zuo Chi arrived. 
"Back then you all were gladly invading our world, so why are you weeping now?"
description.fr:
L'humanité a perdu la guerre. Des hommes d'affaires ont trahi leurs compatriotes, et des chasseurs se sont transformés en monstres, piétinant d'innombrables cadavres humains, tout cela pour le profit. Les créatures d'un autre monde ont envahi le nôtre, le conquérant peu à peu comme un feu dévorant. Mais alors que tout semblait perdu, Zuo Chi est apparu.
"Autrefois, vous envahissiez notre monde avec jubilation. Pourquoi pleurez-vous maintenant ?"

description.en:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.

description.ru:
Чен Еун — незаконнорожденный принц, появившийся на свет без единой частички Нейгуна. С самого раннего детства он находился под гнетом всеобщего отвращения. Весь забитый, с отсутствием какой-либо мотивации, год за годом Еун влачил свое жалкое существование. Ни на что не рассчитывая... и не претендуя.

Будучи изгоем, исконно презираемым шестью великими кланами, в один прекрасный день он оказался в окружении десятка подосланных убийц. Когда глаза практически застлала пелена белого света... и казалось, он уже начал теряться, проваливаясь в пучину... безграничного отчаяния, на горизонте возникла еле заметная фигура.

Неизвестный "потомок", снизошедший из будущего, в мгновение ока уничтожил всех врагов. Прошептав нечто невнятное, он подсадил в тело нашего героя какой-то странный предмет... наномашину. С этого момента все кардинально переменилось. Поселившийся где-то внутри искусственный интеллект дал его жизни невероятный толчок.

Больше не будет как прежде. Это... новая ветвь истории. Истории о парне, который бросил вызов небесам.

altTitles.ja: カレとカノジョの選択

description.en:
A new relationship begins after a seven year reunion!  
  
After being separated for seven years between Hokkaido and Tokyo, a young man waits at the airport to reunite with his best friend. However, what arrives instead is a message from his best friend saying he will be late, and a mysterious beauty! The ever-spirited mangaka, Hiroki Ohara, makes his debut on Comic Newtype!
description.ja: 北海道と東京――離れ離れになってから７年、青年は中学以来に再会する親友を待っていた。そんな彼に届いたのは、遅刻を詫びる親友からのメール、そして謎の美女だった。 気鋭の漫画家・緖原博綺がついにコミックNTに初登場！
description.ko:
어른이 되면 너를 만나러 갈게──.
그 약속을 가슴에 품고, 7년만에 재회한 ‘그’는 ‘그녀’가 되어 있었다?!
이제는 다른 성별이 되어버린 상황에서 동거를 시작한 두 친구의 우정이 향하는 방향은 어디일까?
상쾌한 터치로 그려낸 TS 청춘 스토리, 코믹 레인 신작 ‘그와 그녀의 선택’.
description.zh-hk: 太刀花和真與宮之下遙是從小學就在一起的好朋友。遙在班上大受歡迎，而且很有義氣，實力也不差，因此常常幫助雖然身材高大，但個性比較懦弱的和真。兩人上了國中，因為和真轉學的關係而分開了，但這兩位好友約定好長大之後要再次見面。就這樣過了7年，雖然一直有在聯絡，但兩人的關係漸漸變得有點疏遠的某一天，遙突然告訴和真要到東京找他。經過一番波折之後，兩人終於睽違7年見面了，但是沒想到…遙卻從男生變成女生了！

altTitles.th: สงครามเย็นสุดขั้ว

description.en: The Ice Age apocalypse is coming. After being betrayed and killed by my secret crush, I was reborn and gained a magical ability - the snacks I ate suddenly turned into plants? What's surprising is that this ability can be used in this way... Crisis is everywhere, I want to live for myself in this life!

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

altTitles.ja: 女神のカフェテラス

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
description.ja: 東大現役合格の秀才・粕壁 隼。ケンカ別れしていた祖母の訃報を聞いて、3年ぶりに海辺の町の古びた実家「カフェテラス・ファミリア」に帰ると、そこには見知らぬ５人の女の子が！ しかも彼女たちは「おばあちゃんの家族」を名乗り…!? 運命の女×５との贅沢すぎる共同生活が始まるっ！『涼風』『君町』『風夏』の瀬尾公治が描く一つ屋根の下ハーレム！ どの娘に恋する？どの娘を愛でる？
description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".
description.vi: Kasukabe Hayato đã được nhận vào Đại Học Tokyo ngay trong lần thi đầu tiên. Nhưng sau khi nhận được tin bà nội qua đời, anh trở về ngôi nhà thời thơ ấu của mình, quán cà phê Familia.  Và thấy 5 cô gái lạ mặt tự xưng là "Gia đình của bà"! Cuộc sống mới của Hayato tại một thị trấn ven biển với năm cô gái định mệnh bắt đầu từ đây!

altTitles.en: Ma'am, Your Mask Has Fallen Off Again

description.en:
Mother always said to Qinran: "Your stepfather is from a famous family, your eldest brother is a genius, and your sister is a top student in her high school. You, a country bumpkin, don't embarrass them."

Everyone with status in the capital received a warning from Mr. Juan of the Cheng family: "Mr. Juan's wife is from the countryside and doesn't understand our current situation, and she has a bad temper. In short, everyone should be extra patient."

Until one day, when Master Juan was investigating a certain big boss, his men fell into a confused silence while looking at one of the waistcoats of his sister-in-law who claimed to know nothing…
As demons start creeping in through the Witches' Quarter, its protector must rise to the occasion and stop them from invading the human world.

"You've disturbed something that should have been left alone."
Lee Shin-hyuk, codenamed "Ventablack," is the Korean leader of "55" - an elite special operations unit selected from the world's top black agents. One day, his younger sister Sumin, who dreamed of becoming a K-pop idol trainee, is murdered in South America... and the world tries to cover up this fact.
After abandoning everything to investigate his sister's death, Shin-hyuk confirms that the international drug cartel "XICA" is likely behind it. Subsequently, for his revenge, he deliberately approaches his targets by becoming a bodyguard for "Yoo Chae-won," a global K-pop star whom they were originally targeting.
Finally, he plunges into Brazil's "Favela" - a land of death forsaken even by God...
description.pt-br:
"Você mexeu com algo que não devia."

Shin Hyuk, o líder coreano da unidade de elite das forças especiais "55", composta pelos melhores agentes do mundo, fica devastado quando sua irmã mais nova, Soo Min, que sonhava em se tornar uma trainee de idol, é assassinada na América do Sul. O mundo tenta encobrir a verdade. Abandonando tudo para investigar a morte de sua irmã, Shin Hyuk descobre que o cartel internacional de drogas "XICA" é o provável culpado. Em busca de vingança, ele se aproxima deliberadamente da estrela global do K-pop "Yoo Chae-won", que era o alvo original deles, como seu guarda-costas. No final, ele mergulha na mortal "favela" brasileira, uma terra onde até os deuses viraram as costas...

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
No matter how hard things seem to be, there is always 'someone' watching over you.

A ghost who remained in this world with lingering attachments, one day encountered an office worker left exhausted from work, Nozaki.

"Nobody even looks at me..."

Nozaki was consumed with loneliness.
The ghost, who was all alone at the end of his own life, decided to watch over his daily life.

Though left at the mercy of his job, Nozaki desperately carried on each day.
Until one day, he encountered someone new.

The feelings he lost amid the restless day-to-day, through connecting with others, Nozaki will gradually take back.
description.ja:
どんなつらい時でも、見ていてくれる「誰か」がいる。

この世に未練を残してさまよっていた幽霊は、ある日、仕事に疲れた会社員、野崎と出会う。

「俺のことなんて、誰も見てないんだ…」

孤独感に打ちひしがれる野崎。人生の最後に一人ぼっちだった幽霊は、彼の生活を見守ってみることに。仕事に翻弄されながらも必死に日々を送る野崎。やがて彼に新たな出会いが訪れる。忙しない日々の中でこぼれ落ちてしまった気持ちを、野崎は人との関わりの中で、少しずつ取り戻していく――。

altTitles.ru: Может, я встречу тебя в подземелье - Оратория Меча

description.en:
After having descended upon this world, the gods have created guilds where adventurers can test their mettle. These guilds, known as "familia," grant adventurers the chance to explore, gather, hunt, or simply enjoy themselves.

Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka Gaiden: Sword Oratoria begins in Orario, the lively city of adventurers. The Sword Princess, Ais Wallenstein, and the novice mage, Lefiya Viridis, are members of the Loki Familia, who are experts at monster hunting. With the rest of their group, they journey to the tower of Babel in hopes of exploring the dungeon underneath. Home to powerful monsters, the dungeon will fulfill Ais's desire to master her sword skills, while bringing Lefiya closer to her dream of succeeding Riveria Ljos Alf, vice-captain of the Loki Familia, as the most powerful mage in the land.
___

description.ja: アイズ･ヴァレンシュタインは＜剣姫＞として名高く、第一級冒険者の中でも最強の一角といわれている。そんなアイズでも、まだまだ強くなりたいと思っている様子…？　果たしてそれはなぜ…？
description.ru: Спин-офф ранобэ "Может, я встречу тебя в подземелье", который охватывает историю одной из сильнейших авантюристок по имени Аиз Валленштайн, также известной, как "Принцесса Меча".
